info.name: Arvyax Mobile Backend
info.description:
Generated from arvyax_mobile_backend/src/app.js route mounts.

Notes:
- Set {{baseUrl}} to your running server (default http://localhost:3000).
- Auth routes return OTP in response for testing; this collection auto-saves {{otp}} and {{token}} when possible.
- Some routers are mounted at /api but use short paths (e.g. GET /api/get-audios).
- For endpoints with :r2Key(*) in the URL path, set {{r2Key}} to a URL-encoded key (e.g. videos%2Ffoo.mp4).

exec: // Clear token so subsequent requests don't accidentally reuse it
